#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
    {
        cin>>s;
        int l = s.length();
        for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
          {
              if(s[i]=='a' || s[i]=='e' || s[i]=='i' || s[i]=='o' || s[i]=='u')
              {
                  cout<<"yes"<<endl;
                  break;
              }
              else if(i==l-1) cout<<"no"<<endl;
          }
    }
    return 0;
}
